verses.roman:
pañcaviṁśati paricchede ei kailuṅ anuvāda
yāhāra śravaṇe haya granthārtha-āsvāda

synonyms: pañca-viṁśati paricchede—in the Twenty-fifth Chapter; ei—this; kailuṅ anuvāda—I have made repetition; yāhāra śravaṇe—hearing which; haya—there is; grantha-artha-āsvāda—understanding of the whole contents of the book.
translation: I have thus summarized these pastimes in the Twenty-fifth Chapter. Hearing this, one can understand the whole purport of this scripture.
